name: -webkit-transition
description: Combines -webkit-transition-delay, -webkit-transition-duration, -webkit-transition-property, and -webkit-transition-timing-function into a single property.

<property>.description: Specifies the name of the CSS property to which the transition is applied. See -webkit-transition-property.

<duration>.description: Defines how long the transition from the old value to the new value should take. See -webkit-transition-duration.

<timing_function>.description: Specifies how the intermediate values used during a transition are calculated. See -webkit-transition-timing-function.
